name: 白姝玉
objective:
This course aims to provide students with: Telecommunication overview, Digital transmission technology & systems, Digital switching system, Signaling systems, Traffic theory, Fiber-optic communication systems, Wireless Mobile communication systems
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解電信網路之基本概念、各種設備、及技術標準，以作為學生畢業後從事電信相關行業之基礎知識，也可以作為學生繼續修習通訊相關課程之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)電信概觀 (2)數位傳輸技術 (3)數位交換系統 (4) 信號系統 (5) 光纖通訊系統 (6) 無線行動通訊
schedule:
W1-3 Telecommunication overview
W4 Signals & dB and its application
W5 QoS an Impairments
W6 Transmission and Switching
W7 Local and Long-distance Network 
W8 Signaling and Traffic theory
W9 Midterm Exam
W10-11 Fiber optic communication
W12-15 Wireless mobile telecommunication
W16 Holiday
W17 Review
W18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework 30%
Midterm & Final exams 60%
Class participation 10%
materials:
1. Fundamentals of Telecommunications, R. L. Freeman, Wiley, New York  滄海書局
2. In-class handout
